name: Collaboration - Art Cafe Art Fight 2021 - Game Jam
name_original: Collaboration - Art Cafe Art Fight 2021 - Game Jam
description:
General

Art Cafe Art Fight 2021! Collaboration project of four artists to make this game. Built in Game Maker Studio 2.

Rushed it a bit on the last day, but that's how it usually goes. Got the main art in, but still have a lot of placeholders. Will make an updated version in the future, but today is the deadline for art fight, so this is the official submission version.

Features

Move around, and interact with stuff! Find all the characters, and you can pass the secret door in the cafe.

Controls

Movement - WASD, Arrow Keys, Gamepad D-Pad, Mouse/Touch Screen

Interact - Z, X, Spacebar, Enter, Gamepad A/B, Mouse Left Click

Credits

Coding, Environment Assets

Me

Sprites, Environment Assets

TNR - https://timesnewredux.com/

Character Portraits
